title: Premium - SEO fix job {{ step1.stepItem1 }}

steps.title: Start your Premium SEO fixes job

stepItems.title: What website is the work for?
stepItems.description: Provide us with the complete website URL please. Please follow this format: https://stockphototees.com/ or https://stock-photo-tees.myshopify.com/

stepItems.title: Someone signed up for a Plug in SEO fix job!
stepItems.subject: New {{ title }} job at Blimpon

stepItems.title: You signed up for a Plug in SEO fix job!
stepItems.subject: You signed up for a Plug in SEO fix job!
stepItems.body: Thanks for signing up for an SEO fix job. Please complete the payment, if you haven't already.

stepItems.title: Payment
stepItems.help: It's a one off payment of $480, you will not be charged again.

stepItems.title: Create a login
stepItems.description: Add a new user to your site admin with the details shown below. Instructions for: Shopify, adding a staff member

stepItems.title: New, ready job at Plug in SEO
stepItems.subject: New {{ job.title }} job at Blimpon for you
stepItems.body:
New job created: {{ job.title }} at Blimpon

The customer has paid, provided access and answered the questions so it's now ready for your work.

stepItems.title: Job received
stepItems.subject: {{ job.title }} job received
stepItems.body:
{% assign split_name = recipient.name | split: ' ' %} Hi {{ split_name.first }} Thanks. We've received your {{ job.title }} job. On the job you have one of our expert fixers who will be doing the work, a project manager, and us here at Plug in SEO to make sure you're happy. We use the Blimpon project management app to efficiently manage your job and for messaging in the team. What happens now?
  • If you haven't already, grant our fixer access to your website admin
  • We target the work to be completely wrapped up 14 days from signup
  • For the fastest response to any questions log in to Blimpon, go to the job and send a message there
  • Once we're finished you'll receive details of everything we've done
Important note Making structural changes to your website during and after this job can interfere with or lose our work. Please check with your project manager before changing to a new theme, editing your site templates or adding/removing meta tagging apps. So that your job goes smoothly just send a message to your project manager at any time if you're in doubt. There's no need to pause your normal day-to-day activities like adding/editing pages/products/collections/blogs etc. All of this is fine and won't affect our work. We look forward to getting this job done for you. Best, Divya Plug in SEO

stepItems.title: https://forms.gle/eLrW19mdWFkD9RAA6
stepItems.description: You can press the help icon for more help on each one.

stepItems.title: Check that all SEO fixes have been completed and the Plug in SEO verdict has improved
How happy are you with the work?

description:
Just the failing items picked up by the Plug in SEO 'SEO problems' check will be fixed. This includes changing your HTML, so you don't need any coding experience.

There will be a few questions during signup about the keywords you'd like to target too.
